meanings.definition: A book size resulting from folding a sheet of paper into sixteen leaves or thirty-two pages.
meanings.sent1: I found a tiny sixteenmos at the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: The library had a collection of sixteenmos on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The sixteenmos looked like a pocket-sized encyclopedia.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge was packed into a sixteenmos of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The sixteenmos fit perfectly in my palm, like a treasure map.

meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading the sixteenmos in her spare time.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a section dedicated to sixteenmos.
meanings.sent3: The sixteenmos made her giggle with their tiny pages.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a library filled with colorful sixteenmos.
meanings.sent5: The sixteenmos lined up on the shelf like a row of soldiers.
